details.name: 100 meters of the Dhupdhara Pt-II PWSS pipeline was damaged by the PWD during the excavation of a drain trench to clear waterlogging near Bikali College during a flash flood. Additionally, 3nos. of valves became filled with mud during the flash flood.
details.remarks: As per report received from PHE, GOALPARA Official,approximately 100 meters of the Dhupdhara Pt-II PWSS pipeline was damaged by the PWD during the excavation of a drain trench to clear waterlogging near Bikali College during a flash flood. Additionally, 3nos. of valves became filled with mud during the flash flood occurred on 01/06/2025.

Therefore, as per the orders of higher authorities, hot cooked meals were distributed to a total of 399 affected persons.

No crop area reported, as per the ADO, Agriculture Department, Kaliabor. Because the area is hilly, there are no crops grown here. So, the Agriculture Department said no crops were submerged or damaged in Kalapani,Borghat TE No.2 and Salbari villages., Installation of 4 nos. of Hand Tubewells at Bhurbandha  No.2 Village .Report Submitted by PHE  Department , Kaliabor.), (Raha - Hot Cooked Meal distributed to 3nos. of relief camps, Hot Cooked Meal distributed to JB Garh HS , Toilet Cleaner-06), (Nagaon - Hot cooked meal distributed to the relief camp inmates, total-58)
